title: Send money to debit cards
description: Many marketplaces, like Lyft, Postmates, Instacart, and TaskRabbit, use Stripe to send transfers to sellers’ bank accounts. Starting today, anyone can now send funds to a seller’s debit card too.

title: The commando scientist billionaire who died fighting terrorists
description: Last week, I read a biography that left an impression on me. No Better Time: The Brief, Remarkable Life of Danny Lewin, the Genius Who Transformed the Internet by Molly Knight Raskin documents the 31-year life of Danny Lewin, the Founder of Akamai Technologies.
